bibl.title: Zenon Papyri, Business Papers of the Third Century B.C. Dealing with Palestine and Egypt. I.
bibl.seg: Westermann William Linn and Elizabeth Sayre Hasenoehrl, Zenon Papyri, Business Papers of the Third Century B.C. Dealing with Palestine and Egypt. I. (Columbia Papyri. Greek Series. III.)
New York, 1934, 4°, x-177 pp. et fac-sim.

C.R. par Paul Collart, REG 48 (1935) pp. 590-591. - Vittorio De Falco, BFC 6 (1935) pp. 337-339. - C.C. Edgar, JEA 21 (1935) pp. 122-123. - A.C. Johnson, CP 32 (1937) pp. 81-83. - Heinz Kortenbeutel, RivFil N.S., 16 (1938) pp. 208-212. - J.G. Milne, JHS 56 (1936) pp. 97-98. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 10 (1935) No. 19, pp. 147-151. - Wilhelm Schubart, Gnomon 11 (1935) pp. 423-426. - T.C. Skeat, CR 49 (1935) p. 38. - F. Smolka, Eos 37 (1936) pp. 81-89. - B.A. van Groningen, Museum 42 (1934-1935) coll. 261-262. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 11 (1935) pp. 286-290. - J.G. Winter, CJ 33 (1938) pp. 491-494. - Herbert C. Youtie, AJP 56 (1935) pp. 175-180, reproduit dans: Scriptiunculae. II (Amsterdam, 1973) pp. 783-789.
